name: Brandon PICKENS, et al., petitioners, v. Erma ALDABA, Personal Representative and Next of Kin of Johnny Manuel Leija, Deceased.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Brandon PICKENS, et al., petitioners,
v.
Erma ALDABA, Personal Representative and Next of Kin of Johnny Manuel Leija, Deceased.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit for further consideration in light of Mullenix v. Luna, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 305, ---L.Ed.2d ---- (2015) (per curiam ).
casebody.head_matter:
Brandon PICKENS, et al., petitioners,
v.
Erma ALDABA, Personal Representative and Next of Kin of Johnny Manuel Leija, Deceased.
No. 14-1492.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 9, 2015.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit for further consideration in light of Mullenix v. Luna, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 305, ---L.Ed.2d ---- (2015) (per curiam ).
